entries.meaning: (dated, colloquial or dialect) A politician; one who employs politics.
One who politicks; one who engages in politicking to increase their stature or power within a (non-governmental) business, organization, profession, etc.
examples: CHAPTER ONE The Problem and Its Scope

Organizational politicking is akin to what has been called Machiavellianism.  […]  That is, the "politicker" may strive to eliminate a fellow organization member or an idea espoused by a fellow [member].
